name: Aircraft Flight 3D
description:
Professionally pilot your aircraft
Enjoy the free flight or complete missions
Get daily bonus to unlock more planes
Go from one checkpoint to another

Aircraft Flight 3D gives you a real chance to experience the exciting atmosphere of flying – pilot your own aircraft, complete missions, and enjoy beautiful landscapes!

HOW TO PLAY
Control your aircraft and accomplish missions. Use the joystick and follow the green arrows to find the right way and fly through all circles in a given time. Be quick and accurate!

Free flight and mission modes
> get realistic flight experience.

Checkpoint challenge
> test your skills.

4 amazing planes
> unlock them one by one.

Piloting tutorial
> learn to fly and conquer the sky!
